title: BOSSZD
author: BOSSZD
content: coin informationName: CITU.PoW Algorithm: CITU (unique, fully team-based algorithm, with super privacy and security)Block time: 150 seconds (5 minutes for each algorithm)Block Reward: Dynamic 400 CITU up to blockchain limitOutput per day: 230400/CITUTotal: 1.6 billiondiscord: https://discord.gg/MqkvC3SGHHteleram: https://t.me/citu_coinwallet: https://github.com/CorporateFounder/unitedStates_finalglobal server: https://github.com/CorporateFounder/unitedStates_storageCITU a completely unique project, a unique algorithmis an innovative payment system that allows anyone with internet access to receive or pay from anyone, anywhere in the worldWhen mined, you can generate USD and USDU.S. dollar circulation transactions, stocks have community voting functions and post-function expansions.Features:CITU combines Internet security features to protect you from phishing attempts, malware-infected websites, and other online threats. It ensures an overall safe browsing experience.Our goal is to provide a seamlessly integrated solution covering malware protection, cloud services, internet security, driver scanning and updating, key and password vault, remote device access, secure encrypted wallet and system optimization - all All in one place.Comparing the difference between BTC and ETH, the swimming pools on the market are not suitable for us, and we need experts in swimming pool construction.Join the team think tank and let us be passionate about POW.

comments.author: BOSSZD
comments.body: jdk-20_windows-x64_bin is the operating environment for the win system, first installunitedStates-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT is to run the mining program,For example, the startup command run under C:\ is: startup command under CMD window: java -jar C://unitedStates-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jarThis project is a Russian project, and the launch time of the project party is somewhat different from China's timeMining TutorialEnvironment required: jdk-20_windows-x64_bin.exe download and install https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/jdk20-archive-downloads.htmlChoose the system that suits youoperation process1: https://github.com/CorporateFounder/unitedStates_final/blob/master/target/unitedStates-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar   Download: unitedStates-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT file2: Run cmd under the unitedStates-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT file drive letter3: For example, start the command under the CMD window under the C drive letter: java -jar C://unitedStates-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar      The next step after the program runs4: Enter http://localhost:8082 on the browser     This is the mining program connection server thread5: Create an account, create a wallet, the above is the address, and the bottom is the key, which needs to be kept properly6: Add personal address     Option Settings--in the blank space on change miner address--add personal address--press change miner address to add, and the address will be displayed on the computer after the addition is successful7: Browser option Corporation International Trade Union. Click Update blockchain to update to the latest data block8: After the above steps are completed, select the Get a block option, and the constant mining 576 block in while starts runningNote: It is single-threaded now, and multi-threaded will be launched in the future when the difficulty and personnel increase. If the synchronization is not normal, you need to delete the package resources in the disk C:\resources\blockchain, and then run it again. After running, don’t worry about it and let it run It’s ok, don’t operate frequently, the webpage commands will eventually operate on the computer’s running port, some commands will terminate the current mining, and execute other commands you operate to see if there are blocks and synchronizations on the browser, the first operation One is enough, the block is not synchronized, click to update the latest block, do not start the mining command when updating the block.A single computer is not good and it is useless to try to open more, because its corresponding port is connected to the server background.POW believers BOSSZD salute

This is a big-tittied and smooth-assed project with remarkable assets to compliment its bold outlook. I will get in touch with u later to confer on the key milestones. We are taking u in. Being part of community initiative to help it grow legs with a prompt pace is a vital aspect of our developing at the frontier of decentralization here, in this vast crypto land.  My grandfather has always said, I need more but not everything because otherwise I would yield under the pressure. He has said that most often in delirium. He was a drunkard.

comments.author: BOSSZD
comments.body: Good news, swimming pools are herePOOL：https://github.com/observatory22/citu-cpu-miner/tree/main  Usage: citucminer-v0.1-Windows.exe -w <YOUR_WALLET> -h global.citupool.xyz:2222 -s x -t <YOUR_CPU_COUNT>Check your balance at http://global.citupool.xyz:4444/addr/<YOUR_WALLET>Thanks to Observatory for creating this pool. pay tribute

comments.author: SuprTrupr
comments.created_time: June 22, 2024, 07:09:04 PMLast edit: June 23, 2024, 07:26:51 AM by SuprTrupr
comments.body: Welcome to the world of CITU, a groundbreaking cryptocurrency designed to revolutionize the digital financial landscape. CITU is engineered with a unique blend of Proof of Work (PoW) and Proof of Stake (PoS) mechanisms, offering enhanced security, efficiency, and accessibility.#### VisionAt CITU Corp, our vision is to create a secure, efficient, and decentralized financial ecosystem. We aim to empower users by providing a fair and accessible platform for everyone, regardless of their technological capabilities or financial background.#### Key Features1. **Hybrid Consensus Mechanism**   - **Proof of Work (PoW):** Ensures security and integrity of the blockchain through computational work.   - **Proof of Stake (PoS):** Enhances efficiency and reduces energy consumption by allowing users to validate transactions based on their stake in the network.2. **CPU Mining**   - Designed to be mined using regular CPUs, making it more accessible and democratized compared to GPU or ASIC mining.   - This approach prevents the centralization of mining power and promotes a fair distribution of rewards.3. **Security**   - Advanced cryptographic techniques to safeguard transactions and user data.   - Regular audits and updates to maintain the integrity and robustness of the blockchain.4. **Efficiency**   - Optimized block generation process with an average of 576 blocks mined daily.   - Efficient transaction processing to ensure quick and reliable transfers.5. **Community and Decentralization**   - Strong emphasis on community involvement and governance.   - Decentralized decision-making to ensure that the development and direction of CITU align with the interests of its users.#### Benefits of CITU1. **Fair Mining Opportunities**   - By utilizing CPU mining, CITU provides a level playing field for all participants, reducing the advantage of expensive mining hardware.2. **Reduced Energy Consumption**   - The PoS component significantly lowers the energy requirements compared to traditional PoW-only cryptocurrencies, making CITU more environmentally friendly.3. **Scalability**   - Designed to handle a high volume of transactions, ensuring scalability as the user base grows.4. **Innovative Reward System**   - A unique reward structure that incentivizes both miners and stakeholders, promoting long-term participation and network security.#### Future Roadmap1. **Platform Development**   - Continuous improvements to the CITU blockchain to enhance performance and security.   - Development of user-friendly interfaces and tools for seamless interaction with the blockchain.2. **Partnerships and Integrations**   - Strategic partnerships with other blockchain projects and financial institutions to expand the ecosystem.   - Integration with various applications and platforms to increase the utility of CITU.3. **Community Growth**   - Initiatives to grow and engage the CITU community through educational programs, events, and incentives.   - Encouraging community contributions to the development and governance of the CITU network.#### ConclusionJoin us in shaping the future of finance with CITU. With its innovative hybrid consensus mechanism, fair mining opportunities, and strong commitment to security and decentralization, CITU is set to redefine the cryptocurrency landscape. Be part of this exciting journey and discover more at [citucorp.com/vision](http://citucorp.com/vision)
